patterns.pattern: Tongue flicking to taste the air, a pebbly black snake comes into view.
The glint of pebbly scales alerts you to the entrance of a black snake.
With a faint slithering noise, a pebbly black snake enters.
^You spy a seagull, rooting around the ground for scraps of anything edible.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a carrion beetle.
A carrion beetle enters, scavenging for flesh.
^A carrion beetle scuttles in, searching for food.
A black rat scurries in, looking for food.
A reticulated planthopper lands on a perch nearby, becoming eerily still.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a giant ugly pincher.
An ugly pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
A tiny pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of an ugly pincher.
A giant ugly pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
An ugly pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
A tiny pincher enters, scavenging for flesh.
The faint clicking of insect legs on stone alerts you to the entrance of a tiny pincher.
A giant ugly pincher scuttles in, searching for food.
A large scientific laboratory
Illuminated cave passage between shops
Entering Bloodloch market district
A dockyard slum
Cabalist Ghada nods curtly at you.
